attributes.action: Restore immediately the lost great British Army Infantry Regiments that have just been amalgamated and disbanded by this Government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the following British Infantry army regiments have just been disbanded,amalgamated and "rebadged".The RGBW Glosters-destroyed. The Worcestershires and Sherwood Foresters,destroyed. The Devon and Dorsets,destroyed. The Royal Scots,destroyed. The Royal Welch Fusilers,destroyed. The Royal Green Jackets Rifle Brigade,destroyed, along with many others. Reverse this senseless and most inopportune change.
